Package org.forgerock.cuppa

A test framework for Java 8.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cuppa
    Use the methods of this class to define your tests.
    CuppaTestProvider
    This class allows integrations to control Cuppa and provides access to its model.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CuppaException
    Thrown to indicate that a failure whilst running Cuppa tests.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Test
    Identifies a class as containing Cuppa tests.

Package org.forgerock.cuppa Description

A test framework for Java 8.
